trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref> types to UI Automation.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.

The automation peer that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref> that holds the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref>.
The automation peer that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref>.

Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.ListItem"></xref> enumeration value.

Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName"></xref>.
The string, "RibbonGalleryItem".

Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is the or value; otherwise, `null`.
Gets the automation peer for the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref>.
The automation peer for the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref>.
Scrolls the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref> in order to display the control within the visible region (viewport) of the container.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> interface.
This API is not implemented.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
In all cases.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref> is selected.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.

`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref> is selected; otherwise, `false`.

Removes the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref> from the collection of selected items.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.

Deselects any selected items and then selects the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
Gets the automation peer that acts as the container for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
The automation peer that acts as the container for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref>.
